definition: unable to help however much one would like to (idiom); Although we sympathize, there is no way to help you./My hands are tied.
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
do not/there is none who
surname Mo
surname Neng
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
to help/to assist

sentences.english: I regret that I can not help.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，此事我爱莫能助。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, but it's just not possible.
Sorry to be so disobliging, but I have no money to lend you.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，爱莫能助，我没有钱借给你。

sentences.english: He knew they could not help him.
sentences.chinese: 他知道他们也爱莫能助。

sentences.english: Now, I can't do it for you. I'm too old.
sentences.chinese: 只是我现在爱莫能助，我年纪一大把了。

sentences.english: I appreciate your problem, but I don't think I can help.
sentences.chinese: 我理解你的困难，但却爱莫能助。

sentences.english: He wrecks everything; there is not a thing. I can do about it.
sentences.chinese: 他把什么事都弄糟了，我爱莫能助。

sentences.english: He's having a lot of problems, but my hands are tied.
sentences.chinese: 他有很多困难，但我爱莫能助。
对不起，我真是爱莫能助了。

sentences.english: Nothing can do, the only thing can blame on was did not exercise enough before hike the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 爱莫能助，怪也怪我不好好地做足运动。

definition: impotent (idiom)/powerless/helpless
at one's wit's end/unable to find a way out
have no way out/have no alternative/abbr. to 無奈|无奈[wu2 nai4]
the will is there, but not the strength (idiom)/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
pinyin: xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2

definition: to worry helplessly
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
lit. the whip cannot reach (idiom); beyond one's influence/too far to be able to help
restrain your grief, accept fate (condolence phrase)
to submit to the will of heaven/to resign oneself to fate/to trust to luck
to have no way out/to have no alternative
please find sb better qualified than me (idiom)
(idiom) "no comment"
to admit defeat
to tackle a difficult job (idiom)/to do sth reluctantly
I appreciate your kindness (conventional reply to turn down an offer)
